decks.notes: The deck revolves around utilizing Mystic Forge to cast spells from the top of the library, while also aiming to generate mana quickly with cards like Urza's Tower and Ancient Tomb. The main focus is to assemble a combo by using artifacts like Manifold Key and Voltaic Key to untap Grim Monolith and generate infinite mana, allowing for powerful plays with Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, Eye of the Storms. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Kozilek's Command and Glaring Fleshraker to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan.

The deck focuses on utilizing Death & Taxes creatures, along with powerful equipment and disruption spells to control the board and pressure the opponent. It also includes Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion for additional value and synergy with the deck's flicker effects. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while establishing a strong board presence and applying pressure with efficient creatures and equipment. The mana base is optimized for consistency and the deck includes a variety of versatile threats and answers to deal with different strategies.

The deck focuses on controlling the opponent's resources and winning through the synergy between lands and key artifacts like Dark Depths and Thespian's Stage. By utilizing cards like Mox Diamond and Exploration, it aims to accelerate its game plan while disrupting the opponent with cards like Wasteland and Boseiju, Who Endures. The deck can lock down the opponent with cards like Glacial Chasm and Maze of Ith while generating value through cards like Life from the Loam. Overall, the deck aims to establish board control and outvalue the opponent through its land interactions and efficient removal spells.

This Eldrazi Aggro deck focuses on quickly dropping powerful Eldrazi creatures onto the battlefield while disrupting the opponent's strategy with Chalice of the Void and Wasteland. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Glaring Fleshraker and Eldrazi Linebreaker, backed up by removal spells like Kozilek's Command. The combination of quick mana acceleration from cards like Lotus Petal and Eldrazi Temple, along with disruptive land destruction effects, creates a fast and powerful gameplay experience that can catch opponents off guard and quickly close out the game.

The main concept of this Canadian Threshold deck is to quickly apply pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Delver of Secrets while disrupting their game plan with counterspells like Daze and Force of Will. The deck also includes cards like Questing Druid and Murktide Regent for additional threats. By utilizing efficient card draw and manipulation like Ponder and Brainstorm, the deck aims to maintain tempo and outmaneuver the opponent in Legacy 1 vs 1 matchups. With a balance of aggression and control, the deck seeks to secure victories through strategic plays and efficient use of resources.

The deck focuses on quickly building up an Infect creature, such as Glistener Elf or Blighted Agent, and boosting its power with pump spells like Berserk and Invigorate to deal 10 Infect damage. It also includes protection spells like Snakeskin Veil and Daze to protect the combo and disruption spells like Force of Will to control the game. The mana base is optimized for fetching the necessary colors and supports the strategy with untapped lands like Blinkmoth Nexus. Overall, the deck is designed to win quickly through the Infect mechanic while controlling the opponent's actions.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly and efficiently assemble a graveyard combo using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, and then reanimate powerful creatures such as Griselbrand or Archon of Cruelty to overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes disruption cards like Thoughtseize and Cabal Therapy to control the opponent's hand. With the ability to cheat out powerful creatures early in the game, this deck aims to win through a quick and powerful combo strategy that can be difficult for opponents to stop.

This Merfolk aggro deck focuses on quickly building a strong board presence with creatures like Master of the Pearl Trident, Lord of Atlantis, and True-Name Nemesis, while disrupting opponents with cards like Merfolk Trickster and Harbinger of the Seas. The deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain control of the board throughout the game, utilizing Aether Vial and Cavern of Souls for mana efficiency and protection. With a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure victory through tempo and efficient combat strategies.

This Grixis Control deck focuses on utilizing a combination of disruption spells like Thoughtseize, Daze, and Force of Will, along with removal spells like Fatal Push and Molten Collapse, to control the game and protect its win conditions. The deck employs a mix of efficient threats like Barrowgoyf and Nethergoyf, supported by card advantage engines like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Mishra's Bauble. Additionally, the deck includes lands like Wasteland and Nihil Spellbomb to disrupt the opponent's mana base and graveyard strategies, making it a versatile and powerful control deck in the Legacy format.

This deck focuses on a fast and aggressive playstyle utilizing cards like Lightning Bolt, Thoughtseize, and Abrupt Decay to disrupt opponents while deploying powerful threats like Barrowgoyf and Dauthi Voidwalker. Reanimate is used to bring back key creatures from the graveyard, while Grist, the Hunger Tide provides additional value and token generation. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements and maximize efficiency, with Wasteland and fetch lands for consistency. The goal is to pressure opponents early and maintain control of the board throughout the game.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By leveraging cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Thalia's Lieutenant to disrupt the opponent's game plan, combined with a strong mana denial strategy using Wasteland and Aether Vial, this deck aims to apply relentless pressure while protecting its own creatures with cards like Mother of Runes. With an emphasis on efficient creatures and disruption, this deck seeks to consistently apply pressure and control the board to secure a victory.
